main.name: Vijay Raj C K
main.occupation: Full Stack Developer | Data Engineer | Cloud Data Engineer | Data Analyst
main.description: I eat, sleep, and breathe React, data pipelines, and cloud solutions
main.bio: Hi, I’m Vijay Raj, but you can call me Raj. I’m a Full Stack Developer Intern at Dev Town and have been working as a Data Engineer, Cloud Data Engineer, and Data Analyst at Ingram Micro for the past 2 years. With over 4 years of coding experience, I’ve worked on everything from small projects to large-scale applications. Along the way, I’ve discovered my passion for helping aspiring developers grow and achieve their goals. I hold a Bachelor’s degree in Electronics and Communication Engineering from an Anna University–affiliated college in Chennai.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of developer journey !

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Electronics and Communication Engineering
education.description: Graduated with First-Class Honours (CGPA 9.5) from Jerusalem College of Engineering, affiliated with Anna University. Awarded 'Student of the Year 2023' and 'Best Outgoing Student' for the 2019–2023 batch in recognition of academic excellence, leadership, and dedication to learning.

work.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
work.description: Worked on building and cloning a variety of applications, gaining hands-on experience with modern web technologies and full-stack development.

work.company: Ingram Micro Platform Technology India Private Limited - Chennai
work.title: Data Engineer | Cloud Data Engineer | Data Analyst
work.description: Designing, building, and optimizing data pipelines, cloud solutions, and analytics workflows to drive business insights. Recognized with the 'Dashing Debut Award' and 'Supernova Excellence Award' for exceptional performance and contribution.

testimonials.text: Vijay is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to me... I would definitely recommend
